titlestmt.titleproper: List of Canadian coins and tokens belonging to the American Numismatic Society numbered according to Breton, early 1900s
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: List of Canadian coins and tokens belonging to the American Numismatic Society numbered according to Breton
did.abstract: Two copies of a three-page inventory of Canadian coins and tokens in the collection of the American Numismatic Society

note.p: Was found in folder with Robert Robertson Inventory of Medieval Scandinavian Coins.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Two copies of a three-page inventory of Canadian coins and tokens in the collection of the American Numismatic Society, with numbers assigned from P.N. Breton’s nineteenth-century guide to Canadian coins and tokens.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: List of Canadian coins and tokens belonging to the American Numismatic Society numbered according to Breton, early 1900s, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
